name: Hamstring Reach
what: Loosens tight hamstrings and the lower back, reducing stiffness and helping restore leg mobility after running.
feel: A long, steady pull along the back of your thighs and behind your knees.

name: Standing Quad Stretch
what: Releases tension in the front thighs and hip flexors, both heavily engaged during running.
feel: You’ll feel it across the front of your thigh and near your hip.

name: Calf Stretch
what: Relieves tightness in the calves and improves ankle flexibility, helping prevent soreness and Achilles issues.
feel: A focused stretch in the lower back of your leg, from calf to heel.

name: Hip Flexor Lunge
what: Opens the front of the hips, which get tight from running and sitting afterward. Crucial for stride recovery.
feel: Expect a solid stretch through the front of your hip and upper thigh.

name: Figure Four Stretch
what: Targets the glutes and piriformis, easing tension in the outer hips and helping with lower back relief.
feel: A deep release in the outer glute and hip area of your bent leg.

name: Standing IT Band Stretch
what: Relieves pressure along the outer thigh and supports knee alignment — especially helpful for avoiding runner’s knee.
feel: A steady pull down the outside of your thigh.

name: Butterfly Stretch
what: Opens the inner thighs and groin muscles, improving hip flexibility and overall lower-body recovery.
feel: A wide stretch through your inner thighs near the groin.

name: Seated Forward Fold
what: Calms the spine and helps lengthen the whole back side of the body. Great for breath and nervous system recovery.
feel: A gentle stretch from your lower back through the backs of your legs.

name: Child’s Pose
what: Relaxes the lower back and hips while promoting deep, steady breathing. Perfect to wind down post-run.
feel: You’ll feel gentle pressure in your hips, back, and maybe shoulders.

name: Side Bend Stretch
what: Restores side-body flexibility, helps open up the ribs, and encourages relaxed breathing.
feel: A lengthening pull down one side from ribs to waist.
